TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ComboBoxRenderer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods used to render a combo box control with visual styles. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer>類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現下拉式方塊控制項，與目前作業系統的視覺化樣式的方法。 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該具有目前的視覺化樣式外觀。 若要繪製下拉式方塊，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法，以畫出文字方塊和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawDropDownButton%2A>方法繪製下拉箭號。
如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的用戶端區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawDropDownButton%2A>時，會繪製下拉式方塊與目前的視覺化樣式。 否則，這些方法會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，您可以檢查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性。
這個類別會包裝的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType>設定為其中一個項目所公開<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ComboBox.DropDownButton?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox.TextEdit?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawDropDownButton%2A>方法來繪製滑鼠點選回應的下拉式方塊。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawDropDownButton (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ComboBoxState state);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawDropDownButton(class System.Drawing.Graphics g, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ComboBoxState state) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DrawDropDownButton (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As ComboBoxState)
public: static void DrawDropDownButton(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::ComboBoxState state);
static member DrawDropDownButton : System.Drawing.Graphics * System.Drawing.Rectangle * System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ComboBoxState -> unit

Docs.param: The used to draw the drop-down arrow.
The that specifies the bounds of the drop-down arrow.
One of the values that specifies the visual state of the drop-down arrow.
Docs.summary: Draws a drop-down arrow with the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 之前呼叫這個方法，您應該確認<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>屬性會傳回`true`。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawDropDownButton%2A>中自訂控制項的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法，取決於滑鼠指標位置的狀態繪製下拉箭號。 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer>類別。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

Docs.summary: Draws a text box with the current visual style of the operating system.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a combo box with visual styles.
Docs.value: 如果使用者已啟用作業系統中的視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至用戶端區域的應用程式視窗中：否則， 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxRenderer.DrawDropDownButton%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。
